blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: Crypro is both centralised and decentralised which is why the government are pushing to ban it in Nigeria, though it  is still ine of the most used payment method in the sam Nigeria at the moment What if it were not banned it woud have beeen the ruling exchange in Nigeria
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Opening Party
blogs.body: Opening Party is the word used because ther is about to be a new shift in power on earth which is going to happen sooner ther we expect it mught even happen beacause of the rate at which countries are applying to  be part of the new sysytem about to emmerge from the flames of hwich the previous system has covered them with
